summary: Susanna's quest for love leads to a series of marriages, each ending in the mysterious death of her latest husband.
cast: Priyanka Chopra|Vivaan Shah|Neil Nitin Mukesh|John Abraham|Irrfan Khan|Konkona Sen Sharma|Alexander Diachenko|Shashi Malviya|Annu Kapoor|Naseeruddin Shah|Usha Uthup|Manuj Bhaskar|Harish Khanna|Ayush Tandon|Sanjay Verma|Timothy P. Jarvis|Narendra Kumar|Satish Sharma|Cyndy Khojol|Asha Tage|Bharat Kaul|Ruskin Bond|Benjamin Gilani|Mohan Kapur|Vidushi Mehra
title: 7 Khoon Maaf
